column1: #Text=Ty Lee says : " Ooh , I love the seashell bedspread . "
#Text=" Lo says : " But Ember Island is a magical place .
#Text=" Li says : " Give it a chance .
#Text=" Lo and Li says : " And it can help you understand yourselves and each other .
#Text=" Lo says : " The beach has a special way ... " Li says : " ... of smoothing even the most ragged edges .
#Text=" Lo and Li says : " Time to hit the beach !
#Text=" Toph says : " Aang , I know swimming is fun and all , but do you really think you should be exposing yourself like that ?
#Text=" Katara says : " There are walls all around us .
